## Description {#details}

An analysis for type-inference for VPValues.

It infers the scalar type for a given <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpvalue">VPValue</a> by bottom-up traversing through defining recipes until root nodes with known types are reached (e.g. live-ins or load recipes). The types are then propagated top down through operations. Note that the analysis caches the inferred types. A new analysis object must be constructed once a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a> has been modified in a way that invalidates any of the previously inferred types.

Definition at line 40 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplananalysis-h">VPlanAnalysis.h</a>.

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Type&#42; llvm::VPTypeAnalysis::CanonicalIVTy</>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> of the canonical induction variable.

Used for all VPValues without any underlying IR value (like the vector trip count or the backedge-taken count).
